SmallBusinesses.name: Hinterland Skis
SmallBusinesses.description: Made in the USA, premium quality skis. We build skis with no corners cut or expenses spared. Our wood skis feature real wood veneer top sheets.

featuredProducts.name: HeliCat 135 - Deep Powder
featuredProducts.description: Experience the thrill of big mountain skiing with the HeliCat, designed exclusively for helicopter and cat skiing adventures in Alaska. Hinterland's innovative design ensures exceptional surf-like performance and stability, with a wide reverse sidecut at the front for excellent grip on varied snow conditions. This ski features a full rocker shape, providing effortless flotation in deep powder, along with the power and agility needed to charge through challenging lines and make nimble adjustments on the go.

featuredProducts.name: The Macabre 97 - All Mountain
featuredProducts.description: Step up your game a little bit with the Macabre 97 Ski. This 97mm dream ski adds width underfoot for more stability at high speeds and rocker in the tip which boosts handling through soft snow. We can’t forget to mention this skis exquisite shape with a tapered tip and solid tail which allows the skier to arc ‘em like Mikaela on the groomed terrain. East, west or in between, this ski will keep you jazzed and always looking for that next turn. Take your skiing to the next level, the Macabre 97 level.

featuredProducts.name: The 88 - All Mountain Carve
featuredProducts.description: Ready, set, race with the RACER READY 3,2,1 Beep! The 88 ski is designed to conquer groomers and bring out your inner speed demon. Its sleek shape and 15.5m radius allow for effortless carving, resembling a slalom race ski. With excellent performance on hardpack and the ability to handle variable terrain, this ski is both fast and versatile, guaranteed to make heads turn on the slopes.

SmallBusinesses.name: WhitePaws RunMitts
SmallBusinesses.description: On wet and chilly runs, gather confidence with the WhitePaws RunMitts Wind & Water Resistant mittens. Their innovative design lets you push the mittens down to your wrists as you warm up.

featuredProducts.name: Limited Edition Print
featuredProducts.description: These convertible, thumbless mittens are lightweight and great for this time of year. They are available for pre- order and will ship out in mid-March.

featuredProducts.name: Wind And Water Resistant RunMitts
featuredProducts.description: Patented, Convertible, Thumbless Mittens. More comfortable, wider at knuckles and new labels. Inside pocket to hold a hand warmer.

featuredProducts.name: Double Velour Fleece RunMitts
featuredProducts.description: With a wider fit at the knuckles and new labels for added style, these mitts are both functional and fashionable. Plus, they feature an inside pocket to hold a hand warmer, ensuring your hands stay warm even in the coldest conditions. And the best part? They're machine washable and dryer-friendly, making maintenance a breeze.

SmallBusinesses.name: Harp Vision
SmallBusinesses.description: Tyron and April Harper are the couple behind Harp Vision. Both suffer from chronic conditions and have created all-natural products to relieve pain and improve their quality of life.

featuredProducts.name: Gourmet Body Scrub
featuredProducts.description: Dry, dull skin? Buff away dull dry skin without robbing skin of its own moisture like salt it helps to moisturize, protect and smooth your skin.  Our  scrubs are made with a premium blend of oils and fair trade organic sugar. 10oz

featuredProducts.name: Vegan All Natural Soap
featuredProducts.description: has powerful anti-inflammatory and antibacterial benefits, Petitgrain Essential Oil is a wonderful natural remedy to calm problematic skin. Even skin tone.

featuredProducts.name: Premium Bath Tea
featuredProducts.description: Our premium 10oz tea is blended with colloidal oatmeal, Epsom, Dead Sea and Himalayan Salt with an abundance of minerals and soothing, therapeutic properties that relieves inflammation, sore muscles, joint pain and more.

SmallBusinesses.name: Professor Tobert's
SmallBusinesses.description: Think you know corn? Think again.

featuredProducts.name: Orange Corn Flour
featuredProducts.description: Corn flour might not command the culinary limelight like grits, but ours will quickly become one of your go-to favorites. Use it for imaginative desserts, gluten-free baking, pancakes, corn pudding, breadings and fry batters. Seeking cornbread perfection? Pair it with our corn meal or grits. Non-GMO, gluten-free*, and vegan.

featuredProducts.name: Orange Corn Meal
featuredProducts.description: Corn meal is the switch hitter of this lineup. This versatile pantry staple makes delectable cornbread, corn muffins, pancakes, pizza crust, breadings and fry batters or even polenta in a pinch. Non-GMO, gluten-free*, and vegan.

featuredProducts.name: Orange Corn Grits
featuredProducts.description: The holy grail of grits. Ready in 15 minutes or less, these polenta-grind grits deliver slow-simmered, rich flavor in a fraction of the time. Velvety smooth with a nutty, buttery finish, they work equally well for Southern classics like Shrimp & Grits or traditional Italian polenta. Non-GMO, gluten-free, and vegan.

SmallBusinesses.name: InoarG
SmallBusinesses.description: InoarG directly means, movement towards purification within. Promoting not a new lifestyle, but a change in life beginning within. Learning to love your current self before moving onto your next self is important and InoarG will help you to that path. Here at InoarG we offer yoga, meditation, and physical fitness classes. Once internal balance is found, the physical will reflect!

featuredProducts.name: Private Class
featuredProducts.description: Email me today to schedule your private yoga class.
